Field.DisplayName: Sound radius magnification
Field.Description: Normal when 1x. When set to 0, the radius of sound becomes 0 (SE and SFX are unrelated game-like parameters).

Field.DisplayName: Special effect 0 applied when stepping on hit material
Field.Description: When the character steps on the hit material, the set special effect 0 is exhibited.

Field.DisplayName: Special effect applied when stepping on the hit material 1
Field.Description: When the character steps on the hit material, the set special effect 1 is exhibited.

Field.DisplayName: Foot effect height type
Field.Description: Height to generate foot effect

Field.DisplayName: Foot effect orientation type
Field.Description: Direction of foot effect

Field.DisplayName: Ground height type
Field.Description: For floating items such as the surface of the water

Field.DisplayName: Is fall damage invalid?
Field.Description: Set to 1 for floors that are not subject to fall damage

Field.DisplayName: Is it a hard material for sound echo?
Field.Description: Is it a hard material for sound echo? (0: soft, 1: hard)

Field.DisplayName: Material hardness type
Field.Description: The hardness of the material. Used for soft contact processing of rigid bodies.

Field.Description: Hit material change destination ID due to weather (rain) (-1: No change)
